Articles.Content: So, Just got into Kerbal Space Program, Loving it already. Going to be pre-ordering it when I get some money together, So far I haven't been able to achieve a stable orbit, But i have got myself going almost 1.5 million m/s straight up, Only have 2 problems with the game, 1, theres no moons or planets to go to, 2 I wanna be able to build a space station, which of course is going to require a stable orbit, Working on that one, Lol

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
planet/moons and staions will all come in time but your not alone about trying to get a stable orbit
